mapper.select: select SKU, OPER, PACKAGINGNAME, PICTURE3, COSTPRICE, VOLUME, GROUPID, ICLASS, STYPE, ALERTNUM, SAVENUM, CREATETIME, OPERTIME, CATEGORYID, LOCATIONID, MANUFACTURE, STATUS, STORAGE, PACKAGEOPER, LOCATION, PICTURE4, OPENFLAG, SELLPRICE, ALERTDAY, PURCHASEOPER, DECLAREDVALUE, LENGTH, PICKUPOPER, HIGH, PACKAGINGID, SAVEDATE, PACKAGINGWEIGHT, PICTURE1, WEIGHT, PURCHASEDAY, LINKITEMID, APPLYOPER, STORAGEID, SELLOPER, MANUFACTUREID, WIDTH, PICTURE2, PACKAGINGFEE, PRODUCTTITLE, PRODUCTNAME, DESCR, PRODUCTNAMEEN, CONTENT, NAMECHN from db_productdevelopnew where SKU = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SKU, OPER, PACKAGINGNAME, PICTURE3, COSTPRICE, VOLUME, GROUPID, ICLASS, STYPE, ALERTNUM, SAVENUM, CREATETIME, OPERTIME, CATEGORYID, LOCATIONID, MANUFACTURE, STATUS, STORAGE, PACKAGEOPER, LOCATION, PICTURE4, OPENFLAG, SELLPRICE, ALERTDAY, PURCHASEOPER, DECLAREDVALUE, LENGTH, PICKUPOPER, HIGH, PACKAGINGID, SAVEDATE, PACKAGINGWEIGHT, PICTURE1, WEIGHT, PURCHASEDAY, LINKITEMID, APPLYOPER, STORAGEID, SELLOPER, MANUFACTUREID, WIDTH, PICTURE2, PACKAGINGFEE, PRODUCTTITLE, PRODUCTNAME, DESCR, PRODUCTNAMEEN, CONTENT, NAMECHN from db_productdevelopnew

and 1=1
